00055 #ifndef PARTICLE_H
00056 #define PARTICLE_H
00057 #define PARTICLE_SPEC \
00058 "struct particle { \
00059         long isthep; \
00060         long idhep; \
00061         long jmohep[2]; \
00062         long jdahep[2]; \
00063         float phep[5]; \
00064         float vhep[4]; \
00065 };"
00066 typedef struct particle_st {
00067         int isthep; /* status code of the entry */
00068         int idhep; /* particle identity, accordingly to the PDG standard */
00069         int jmohep[2]; /* pointer(s) to position where the mother(s) stored */
00070         int jdahep[2]; /* pointers to position of the first/last daughter */
00071         float phep[5]; /* p4 and mass (GeV) */
00072         float vhep[4]; /* production vertex (mm) and time (mm/c) */
00073 } PARTICLE_ST;
00074 #endif /* PARTICLE_H */
